name: Watch2Gether widescreen
description: A wide-screen version of watch2gether, so you can watch without squinting, or changing the zoom settings in your browser.

user.name: ranuncudahlia
user.about: Hello! I'm a programmer, musician, artist, and game developer. I'm a Museum Studies major in university and have an associate degree in English. Feel free to check out my carrd to see more of my work, including my bandcamp and my itch.io!
